ml_tags: 02/07/1940 - 20/04/2022 "Forever Always, Always Forever" Arrondale Monkley You were the first man I loved & you took my heart with you when you left me behind. You made me laugh & cry No one will ever know The love I have for you. You raised & sheltered me, You loved & cherished me Thankyou Poppy My world, You are my hero, & usually at the same time. & forever your baby
